divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the top of my driveway,I noticed a bright light it was flashing wildlyon a hill across from me I grabbed my camera I pointed my video camera at it itseemed to be changing shapes. as I filmed it shot what appear to be protoplasmicballs in my direction,they followed a zigzag trajectory as they approached Icaught this all on video. If you email me I can send photo excerpts from thevideo, they are not as clear as the video but they serve as a basic record. Iwould be willing to have an investigator view it in my prescence. It is on VHStape.
Summary: Video-Light at treetop level that shoots a ball at
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 31st 1995
